thread.title: Outstanding property and staff
thread.title_full: Outstanding property and staff - Review of The Ritz-Carlton New York, Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: G8496VRbarbarah
title: Outstanding property and staff
text: The professional and intuitive staff at the Ritz Central Park made our stay a truly exceptional experience. Of course, the location can't be beat, the restaurants were wonderful and the amnitis top notch, but the personalized service of the entire staff made the stay truly spectacular.
